verbs.description: Just as [ARG1: Paul Manafort 's legal troubles] [V: intensify] , Trump 's pals at the National Enquirer announce they have dirt on Trump 's former campaign chairman .
Just as Paul Manafort 's legal troubles intensify , Trump 's pals at the National Enquirer announce [ARG0: they] [V: have] [ARG1: dirt on Trump 's former campaign chairman] .
